title: Database Performance Analysis Complete
description: Successfully analyzed 18 core tables in Stand Up Sydney database. Found current row counts: profiles(4), user_roles(10), events(4), applications(4), invoices(5), notifications(4), etc. Identified critical indexing needs for foreign keys, status fields, and date columns. All tables exist and schema is healthy.

solution.description: Successfully completed comprehensive database analysis for Stand Up Sydney platform. Created performance optimization migration with 40+ indexes covering all critical query patterns. Generated detailed report with implementation strategy. Ready for testing and deployment phase.
